original_title: House of Whores 2: The Second Cumming
overview: What do you get when you cross a sexually depraved Preacher with 2 coke snorting nymphomaniacs? Well, you get a visit from Slasho, Shago and Smasho, that's what you get! That's right, the Clowns are back for an all-new adventure! Follow along as our 3 Masked Maniacs terrorize another home hidden in the suburbs of degenerates. Travel deep into the depths of Sluggo's lab and marvel at his latest creation, Skanko! Feast your eyes on the stunning beauty of Naughty Nina as you helplessly fall under the alluring spell of Nurse Hatchet...the Ruler of Pussyland!
tagline: Praise the Lord, the Clowns are back!
title: House of Whores 2: The Second Cumming
